judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Oohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Appellants to pay costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Donald L. McGaskey, with him Dale Gleland, William G. Hurtt, and Gleland, Hurtt and Witt, and Buchanan, Ingersoll, Rodewald, Kyle and Buerger, for appellants.

Harvey A. Miller, Jr., with him Miller & Miller, for appellee.
